title: Observer status for the Climate Vulnerable Forum in the
text:
United Nations 
A/C.6/80/L.5 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16083 (E)    101025 
*2516083* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Sixth Committee 
Agenda item 176 
Observer status for the Climate Vulnerable Forum 
in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
 
Barbados, Burkina Faso and Ghana: draft resolution 
 
 
 
 Observer status for the Climate Vulnerable Forum in the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Climate 
Vulnerable Forum, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Climate Vulnerable Forum to participate in the 
sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution.

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Climate Vulnerable Forum to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
